66261.name: Favor spanking to discipline child - Strongly agree (US General Social Survey (2017))
66261.description: The General Social Survey in the US asks: Do you strongly agree, agree, disagree, or strongly disagree that it is sometimes necessary to discipline a child with a good, hard spanking? This variable records the number of survey responses stating 'Strongly Agree'
66261.datasetName: Violent discipline in the US (US General Social Survey (2017))

source.name: US General Social Survey (2017)
source.additionalInfo: The General Social Survey in the US asks: Do you strongly agree, agree, disagree, or strongly disagree that it is sometimes necessary to discipline a child with a good, hard spanking?
